scenes.background: (Bob) crosses his arms, looking frustrated. (Monica) leans forward, tapping her fingers on the desk.
scenes.description: 'Seriously, we are all at our limit. Can't you just help a bit longer?'

options.text: I understand the pressure. Let’s try to wrap this up quickly.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the situation and offered to help more, showing good empathy and perception, but your self-regulation and motivation could be stronger.

options.text: I really need to stick to my break. Maybe we can redistribute the tasks?
options.analysis: You stood firm on needing your break, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation to help.

options.text: It’s not fair that this always falls on me. This needs better planning.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, potentially straining relationships with your colleagues.
